name: Where is the beer?
description:
Based on a role-playing game, this fire emblem-style game is a small project that is almost finished (except for the epilogue and some loose dialogues).

I wanted to learn how to use Srpgstudio a bit and so I did, now, I would like to know what you think of the level design and the battles. The story and texts are in Spanish ( I'm currently translating it to english). But they are not really important right now.

They only serve as a binder for battle maps. 

Thank you very much for your time and let me your thoughts on comments!.

Duration: 45m to 1:30h

"image: Freepik.com". This cover has been designed using assets from Freepik.com
